Say - Class in jmud.command
Represents a command to say a message in the player's current room.

Constructs a new command object for the Say command.
sendMessage(String) - Method in class jmud.ClientDescriptor
Sends message to the client connected over this handler.
sendToAll(String) - Static method in class jmud.Server
Sends message to each client connected to the server

stripColorTokens(String) - Static method in class jmud.ChatColor
